articles.description: Donald Trump's return to the White House can help pave the way for peace in golf's 'civil war', says four-time major champion Rory McIlroy.
articles.title: Donald Trump and Elon Musk can bring PGA Tour and LIV Golf together, says Rory McIlroy

articles.description: Tyrone Mings became the first Englishman to concede a penalty on his Champions League debut in bizarre fashion as Aston Villa lost to Brugge.
articles.title: Tyrone Mings: Aston Villa punished in Champions League after defender's 'moment of madness'

articles.description: Conor Benn's provisional suspension is lifted after a two-year battle with UK Anti-Doping (Ukad) and the British Boxing Board of Control (BBBofC).
articles.title: Conor Benn: British fighter has provisional suspension lifted after two-year battle

articles.description: Paris St-Germain's winless run in the Champions League extends to three games as they are beaten at home by Atletico Madrid.
articles.title: PSG 1-1 Atletico Madrid: Late winner extends PSG's winless streak

articles.description: Zheng Qinwen crushes Jasmine Paolini to secure a place in the WTA Finals last four on her tournament debut.
articles.title: WTA Finals: Zheng Qinwen crushes Jasmine Paolini to reach semi-finals; Aryna Sabalenka faces Elena Rybakina

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Red Star Belgrade vs Barcelona in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Red Star Belgrade 2-5 Barcelona: Robert Lewandowski reaches 99 Champions League goals

articles.description: The FA and FAI are fined after the booing of both national anthems before England's Nations League match against Republic of Ireland in September.
articles.title: Uefa fines FA and FAI after England and Republic of Ireland fans boo anthems

articles.description: Tadhg Furlong is ruled out of Ireland's opening autumn Test against the All Blacks on Friday because of injury.
articles.title: Ireland v New Zealand: Tadhg Furlong ruled out of Dublin Test but Ronan Kelleher starts
